## ğŸ§ª Testing Checklist

### Backend (if applicable)
- [ ] Added/updated unit tests
- [ ] Added/updated integration tests
- [ ] All tests pass locally (`pytest`)
- [ ] Code coverage maintained or improved
- [ ] Linting passes (`ruff check app/`)
- [ ] Formatting correct (`black --check app/`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`mypy app/`)
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities (`bandit -r app/`)

### Frontend (if applicable)
- [ ] Added/updated component tests
- [ ] Added/updated E2E tests (if needed)
- [ ] All tests pass locally (`npm test`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`npx tsc --noEmit`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] UI tested in multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
- [ ] Mobile responsiveness checked

### Integration
- [ ] Tested with backend running
- [ ] API endpoints work as expected
- [ ] Database migrations run successfully (if applicable)
- [ ] No breaking changes to existing workflows
- [ ] Backward compatibility maintained
